name: Create Variant Mummy
components: V, S, M (onyx gems worth 50 gp per HD of the undead to be created)
target: 1 corpse steeped in a peat bog for at least 24 hours
text: This spell functions as create undead (Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook 262), except it creates one of the following variant mummies: bog mummy, ice mummy, or Osirian tomb guardian.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（要创造的不死生物所具有的每个HD价值50gp的黑玛瑙）
target_zh: 一具浸泡在泥炭沼泽（a peat bog）中至少24小时的尸体
text_zh: 该法术如同唤起死灵（《核心规则书》262页）一样作用，除了它创造的是以下的变体木乃伊之一：沼泽木乃伊，冰封木乃伊，或奥斯里昂墓穴守卫。
